name: VZLinuxBootLoader
desc: An object that loads and configures a Linux kernel as the guest system of your VM.

items.name: init(kernelURL: URL)
items.desc: Creates a boot loader that launches the Linux kernel at the specified URL.

items.name: var commandLine: String
items.desc: The command-line parameters to pass to the Linux kernel at boot time.

items.name: var initialRamdiskURL: URL?
items.desc: The location of an optional RAM disk, which the boot loader maps into memory before it boots the Linux kernel.

items.name: var kernelURL: URL
items.desc: The URL of the Linux kernel file.
